info.description: This is the API server for the Police Training application.
info.title: Police Training API

get.description: Retrieve a list of enrollment statuses with optional filtering by status name
Retrieve an enrollment status by its ID

patch.description: Perform a partial update on an enrollment status record

get.description: Retrieve a list of formations with optional filtering by name and region
Retrieve a formation by its ID

patch.description: Perform a partial update on a formation record

get.description: Retrieve the user record associated with the current request context
Retrieve a list of officers with optional filtering by regulation number, posting, rank, formation, and region
Retrieve an officer by its ID

delete.description: Delete an officer by its ID

patch.description: Perform a partial update on an officer record

get.description: Retrieve a list of postings with optional filtering by name and code
Retrieve a posting by its ID

patch.description: Perform a partial update on a posting record

get.description: Retrieve a list of ranks with optional filtering by rank name and code
Retrieve a rank by its ID

patch.description: Perform a partial update on a rank record

get.description: Retrieve a list of regions with optional filtering
Retrieve a region by its ID

patch.description: Perform a partial update on a region record

post.description: Generates an authentication token for a user based on provided email and password.
Generates a password reset token and sends it to the user's email address.

get.description: Retrieve a list of training categories with optional filtering by name and active status
Retrieve a training category by its ID

patch.description: Perform a partial update on a training category record

get.description: Retrieve a list of training statuses with optional filtering by status name
Retrieve a training status by its ID

patch.description: Perform a partial update on a training status record

get.description: Retrieve a list of training types with optional filtering by type name
Retrieve a training type by its ID

patch.description: Perform a partial update on a training type record

get.description: Retrieve a list of users with optional filters and pagination

post.description: Create a new user account and send an activation email

put.description: Activate a user account using an activation token
Resets a user's password using a valid password reset token.

delete.description: Delete a user record by ID

patch.description: Perform a partial update on a user record

get.description: Retrieve a list of workshops with optional filtering by name, category, training type, and active status
Retrieve a workshop by its ID

patch.description: Perform a partial update on a workshop record
